newsitem.title: USA: Trans Energy acquires drilling prospect.
newsitem.headline: Trans Energy acquires drilling prospect.

text.p: Trans Energy Inc said it acquired a drilling prospect in Crook County, Wyo. for an undisclosed price.
Trans Energy said it will be shooting a six-square-mile 3-D seismic program which will locate the optimal locations for drilling. Drilling will begin as soon as the seismic is completed.
Reserves are estimated to be 3.5 million barrels, Trans Energy said.

Trans Energy said the field to north of the area has produced 1.7 million barrels of oil since 1986, while the field to the west, has produced over 790,000 barrels of oil from one 40 acre tract. The southwest field, has produced in excess of 3.2 million barrels of oil.
Trans Energy lost 1-3/8 to 2-7/8 in midday trading.
